select count(1) FROM SBK_TB
INNER JOIN JOB_TB ON SBK_TB.SBK_YM = JOB_TB.SBK_YM AND SBK_TB.TYPE = JOB_TB.SBK_TYPE AND SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ = JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ AND SBK_TB.REVISION = JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION AND JOB_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_ITEM_TB ON JOB_TB.QUO_YM = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_YM AND JOB_TB.QUO_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_SEQ AND TEST_ITEM_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ
LEFT JOIN RAW_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_SEQ = RAW_TB.TEST_SEQ
LEFT JOIN TEST_STNDR_TB ON TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ = TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ
/* 시료정보 - 총 갯수, 반입 반출의 최신 SEQ */ LEFT JOIN IM_TOTAL_V ON CONCAT ('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, '-', SBK_TB.TYPE, LPAD(SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), IF(REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',REVISION), '')) = IM_TOTAL_V.SBK_ID
/* 반입 반출의 최신 정보 */ LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB in_sub ON in_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = IM_TOTAL_V.IN_SUB_SEQ AND CONCAT ('IM', IM_YM, '-', 'G', LPAD(IM_SEQ,4,0)) = in_sub.IM_ID LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB out_sub ON out_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = IM_TOTAL_V.OUT_SUB_SEQ AND CONCAT ('IM', IM_YM, '-', 'G', LPAD(IM_SEQ,4,0)) = out_sub.IM_ID
WHERE 1 = 1 # 재발행 신청서 제외 AND SBK_TB.REVISION = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(SBK_TB.INS_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.MODEL_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR like CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(TEST_TB.INS_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND SBK_TB.TYPE = #{item.searchWord}
AND TEST_RPRT_K_YN = 1 AND TEST_RPRT_N_YN = 1
AND CASE WHEN IF (TEST_PLACE_OUT_YN=1,'현장시험',IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'),'-')) = '현장시험' THEN '3' WHEN ISNULL(in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE) THEN '1' ELSE '2' END = #{item.searchWord}
AND CASE WHEN ISNULL(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE) THEN '1' ELSE '2' END = #{item.searchWord}
AND CONCAT ('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, '-' , SBK_TB.TYPE, LPAD(SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), IF(REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',SBK_TB.REVISION), '')) LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT ('SB', JOB_TB.SBK_YM, '-' , JOB_TB.SBK_TYPE, LPAD(JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), '-', IF (TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE = 'NS', 'SF', TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE), LPAD(TEST_TB.TEST_NO,4,0), IF(JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION), '')) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND FN_MEM_NAME(in_sub.CARRY_IN_ID) like CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')

SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as no, lst.* FROM ( SELECT
FN_GET_SEQSTRING('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, SBK_TB.TYPE, SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ) sbkId, DATE_FORMAT(SBK_TB.INS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') RCPT_DT, /* 현장시험일 경우에는 시료반입일에 현장시험 노출 */ IF (TEST_PLACE_OUT_YN=1,'현장시험',IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'),'-')) CARRY_IN_DATE, FN_MEM_NAME (in_sub.CARRY_IN_ID) CARRY_IN_NAME, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(TEST_TB.INS_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') testDtStr, IFNULL (CONCAT (FN_GET_SEQSTRING('SB', JOB_TB.SBK_YM, JOB_TB.SBK_TYPE, JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ), '-', IF (TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE = 'NS', 'SF', TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE), LPAD(TEST_TB.TEST_NO,4,0)), '') testId, IFNULL (JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') cmpyName, JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME, JOB_TB.MODEL_NAME, IFNULL (cate1.NAME, '') crtfc1Name, IFNULL (cate2.NAME, '') crtfc2Name, IFNULL (cate3.NAME, '') crtfc3Name, IFNULL (cate4.NAME, '') crtfc4Name, IF (TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ=0, TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_STNDR_TEXT, IFNULL (TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR, '')) TEST_STNDR, IFNULL (IM_TOTAL_V.IN_CNT, 0) inCnt, IFNULL (IM_TOTAL_V.OUT_CNT, 0) outCnt, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') CARRY_OUT_DATE, FN_MEM_NAME(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_ID) CARRY_OUT_NAME, IFNULL (FN_CODE_NAME(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_CODE, 'TC'), '') CARRY_OUT_TYPE, IFNULL (out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_NAME, '') CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_NAME, IFNULL (out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_INVC, '') CARRY_OUT_DLVRY_INVC, CONCAT_WS (', ', IF (TEST_RPRT_K_YN = 1, 'KOLAS', NULL), IF (TEST_RPRT_N_YN = 1, '일반', NULL)) TEST_RPRT, IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(TEST_TB.REPORT_DT, '%Y-%m-%d'), '-') REPORT_DT FROM SBK_TB
INNER JOIN JOB_TB ON SBK_TB.SBK_YM = JOB_TB.SBK_YM AND SBK_TB.TYPE = JOB_TB.SBK_TYPE AND SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ = JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ AND SBK_TB.REVISION = JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION AND JOB_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_ITEM_TB ON JOB_TB.QUO_YM = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_YM AND JOB_TB.QUO_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.QUO_SEQ AND TEST_ITEM_TB.STATE != 'D'
LEFT JOIN TEST_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ = TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_ITEM_SEQ
LEFT JOIN RAW_TB ON TEST_TB.TEST_SEQ = RAW_TB.TEST_SEQ
LEFT JOIN TEST_STNDR_TB ON TEST_ITEM_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ = TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR_SEQ
/* #3 적용규격 왼쪽에 [인증종류1]정보로 열 추가 해주세요 */ LEFT JOIN TEST_CATE_TB cate4 ON TEST_ITEM_TB.CRTF_TYPE_SEQ = cate4.TEST_CATE_SEQ LEFT JOIN TEST_CATE_TB cate3 ON cate4.TOP_DEPTH_SEQ = cate3.TEST_CATE_SEQ LEFT JOIN TEST_CATE_TB cate2 ON cate3.TOP_DEPTH_SEQ = cate2.TEST_CATE_SEQ LEFT JOIN TEST_CATE_TB cate1 ON cate2.TOP_DEPTH_SEQ = cate1.TEST_CATE_SEQ
/* 시료정보 - 총 갯수, 반입 반출의 최신 SEQ */ LEFT JOIN IM_TOTAL_V ON CONCAT ('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, '-', SBK_TB.TYPE, LPAD(SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), IF(REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',REVISION), '')) = IM_TOTAL_V.SBK_ID
/* 반입 반출의 최신 정보 */ LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB in_sub ON in_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = IM_TOTAL_V.IN_SUB_SEQ AND CONCAT ('IM', IM_YM, '-', 'G', LPAD(IM_SEQ,4,0)) = in_sub.IM_ID LEFT JOIN IM_SUB_TB out_sub ON out_sub.IM_SUB_SEQ = IM_TOTAL_V.OUT_SUB_SEQ AND CONCAT ('IM', IM_YM, '-', 'G', LPAD(IM_SEQ,4,0)) = out_sub.IM_ID
INNER JOIN (SELECT @rownum:=0) r
WHERE 1 = 1 # 재발행 신청서 제외 AND SBK_TB.REVISION = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(SBK_TB.INS_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.CMPY_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.PRDCT_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND IFNULL(JOB_TB.MODEL_NAME, '') like concat('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND TEST_STNDR_TB.TEST_STNDR like CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(TEST_TB.INS_DT, '%Y%m%d') between date_format(#{item.startDate}, '%Y%m%d') and date_format(#{item.endDate}, '%Y%m%d')
AND SBK_TB.TYPE = #{item.searchWord}
AND TEST_RPRT_K_YN = 1 AND TEST_RPRT_N_YN = 1
AND CASE WHEN IF (TEST_PLACE_OUT_YN=1,'현장시험',IFNULL (DATE_FORMAT(in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'),'-')) = '현장시험' THEN '3' WHEN ISNULL(in_sub.CARRY_IN_DATE) THEN '1' ELSE '2' END = #{item.searchWord}
AND CASE WHEN ISNULL(out_sub.CARRY_OUT_DATE) THEN '1' ELSE '2' END = #{item.searchWord}
AND CONCAT ('SB', SBK_TB.SBK_YM, '-' , SBK_TB.TYPE, LPAD(SBK_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), IF(REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',SBK_TB.REVISION), '')) LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT ('SB', JOB_TB.SBK_YM, '-' , JOB_TB.SBK_TYPE, LPAD(JOB_TB.SBK_SEQ,4,0), '-', IF (TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE = 'NS', 'SF', TEST_TB.TEST_TYPE_CODE), LPAD(TEST_TB.TEST_NO,4,0), IF(JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION > 0, CONCAT ('-',JOB_TB.SBK_REVISION), '')) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
AND FN_MEM_NAME(in_sub.CARRY_IN_ID) like CONCAT('%',#{item.searchWord},'%')
ORDER BY SBK_TB.INS_DT ASC, TEST_TB.INS_DT ASC ) lst
order by no asc LIMIT #{pageUnit} OFFSET #{firstIndex};
